short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple quick note extension with a character counting feature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed for quick notes that will be saved and synched across all your desktop devices

Has two modes:

1) pop-up window
2) side panel

Keyboard shortcut to open pop-up window or side panel: Alt+N

If you have any questions, please contact me by email

Source code: https://github.com/roman-w3lifer-grinyov/crx-simple-quick-note
